mapper.select: select zztmc.`year`,zztmc.`month`,zztmc.gctrl_times FROM zz_time_month_count zztmc GROUP BY zztmc.`year`,zztmc.`month` ORDER BY zztmc.`year`,zztmc.`month`
select zztmc.`year`,sum(zztmc.gctrl_times) as gctrl_times FROM zz_time_month_count zztmc GROUP BY zztmc.`year` ORDER BY zztmc.`year`
select zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day`,zztdc.gctrl_times FROM zz_time_day_count zztdc GROUP BY zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day` ORDER BY zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day`

select zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day`,zztdc.gctrl_times FROM zz_time_day_count zztdc WHERE zztdc.`year`= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y') GROUP BY zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day` ORDER BY zztdc.`year`,zztdc.`month`,zztdc.`day`

select `year`,academy ,sum(undergraduate_times) undergraduate_times,sum(graduate_times) graduate_times,sum(teacher_times) teacher_times,sum(other_times) other_times FROM zz_gctrl_month_academy_identity GROUP BY `year` ,academy ORDER BY `year` ,academy

select ymdchar,day,academy,m_times,f_times FROM zz_gctrl_day_academy_gender WHERE ymddate > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 16 DAY) AND ymddate < CURDATE() GROUP BY ymdchar,academy ORDER BY ymdchar,academy
select school,academy,all_times/1000 as all_times FROM zz_gctrl_month_academy_identity GROUP BY school,academy ORDER BY school,academy
SELECT a.ymdchar AS time,gctrl_times FROM zz_time_day_count a WHERE a.`year` = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y') GROUP BY a.ymdchar ORDER BY gctrl_times DESC LIMIT 12
